climbs.name: Pool Party
climbs.fa: Scott Duemler, Aaron Collins, Bob Petit

content.description: Very aesthetic line above pool on slab left of long arête. Easy climbing, beautiful views. Have a party!
content.location: Starts just above water at pool on right side of wall.

climbs.name: Lock and Key
climbs.fa: Mike Knarzer, Scott Duemler, Pete Tagala

content.description: Nice open book. Bottom section climbs more like sport, upper half more like trad with nice finger locks. Obvious crux well protected with bolts, but whole route steep and nothing easy. Located on middle/main part of stained Canyoneers Wall on left part of that wall.
content.protection: Three bolts and light rack including doubles of tips through hands sized pieces.

content.description: A pumpy, deceptive route directly to the right of Pool Party.  The crux is clipping bolt 2 and has potential for ground fall if the belayer is not anchored to the ground.  A difficult start yields to enjoyable and relatively easier climbing.
content.location: Directly over the water to the right of Pool Party, belayer should use cams to anchor to the ground and avoid going into the water if the climber falls.

climbs.name: Beatnik Boogie
climbs.fa: Bob Petit, Scott Duemler, Aaron Collins

content.description: On left side of wall on red and stained rock. Right most crack to overhang, starts in squeeze. Fun, mostly 5.8/9.
content.protection: Singles through #3 BD with double #1, one extendable runner. Bolted anchor on top.

content.description: As you travel upstream from where Spring Creek Enters Christopher Creek, you will come to a large pool then narrows where canyoneers often exit on day trips. Looking left from the pool as you face the narrows is a colorful wall, beginning on the left as a 50 ft tall deeply red and streaked wall, continuing along a taller, lichen covered wall, and ending at the waters edge at a dome of rock that is slabby on one side and steep/water worn on the gorge side - this has the route "Pool Party" on it. The walls contain a mixture of cracks and face.
